description.abjurationCarefulSkill: Can be carefully crafted by a spellcaster into an amulet that requires attunement.

description.abjurationCarefulAdditionalDetail: While attuned to the amulet, a creature can cast Protection from Evil and Good once

description.abjurationMasterSkill: Can be mastercrafted by a spellcaster into an amulet of lightning absorption, which requires attunement.

description.abjurationMasterAdditionalDetail: An attuned creature is immune to lightning damage, and if it would take lightning damage, it instead regains hit points equal to the damage that would have been dealt.

description.unskilled: Difficult to transport, as big as a large creature. No immediate use.

description.abjurationMasterSkill: Can be mastercrafted by a spellcaster into a Heart of Sorrow, which requires attunement and takes up two attunement slots.

description.abjurationMasterAdditionalDetail: The Heart gains AC 15 and 50 hit points. If an attuned creature would take damage, and is on the same plane of existence as the Heart, it can choose to have the Heart of Sorrow take that damage instead. As long as the Heart of Sorrow has at least 1 hit point, it regains all lost hit points at dawn. The Heart shatters if it is reduced to 0 hit points. Can be mastercrafted (alchemist’s supplies) into 1d10 Potions of Tarrasque Strength (for 1 hour, your Strength score becomes 30. It has no effect if your Strength score is already 30 or higher).

description.abjurationMasterSkill: Can be mastercrafted by a spellcaster into a suit of medium or heavy armor that requires attunement.

description.abjurationMasterAdditionalDetail: This item is destroyed if the Vampire is killed while staked through the heart. While wearing the armor, an attuned creature regains 20 hit points at the start of its turn, as long as it has at least 1 hit point. The heart is exposed on the armor, and if it is in direct sunlight or the attuned creature takes radiant damage, this trait doesn’t function at the start of the attuned creature’s next turn. If a creature attacks the heart and pierces it with a wooden stake (AC 20 to hit), the armor loses this property and becomes mundane.

description.abjurationMasterSkill: Can be mastercrafted by a spellcaster into an Amulet of Magic Resistance, which requires attunement.

description.abjurationMasterAdditionalDetail: An attuned creature has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

description.herbalismSkilled: Can be crafted into incense to burn in a Censer of Controlling Air Elementals.

description.herbalismAdditionalDetail: Allows one additional use of the item per day. Consumed upon use.

description.herbalismSkilled: Can be crafted into a Potion of Invisibility or an Oil of Etherealness.

description.herbalismMasterSkilled: Can be mastercrafted into a Stone Salve

description.herbalismMasterAdditionalDetail: Ends the petrified condition on a creature it is applied to.

description.herbalismCarefulSkilled: Can be carefully crafted into a Potion that acts as a Raise Dead spell, except that the target must currently be undead for the spell to take effect.

description.herbalismCarefulAdditionalDetail: This potion returns the creature to life as per the spell, despite the fact that the creature is undead.

description.herbalismSkilled: Can be crafted into a potion of Hrugguk.

description.herbalismAdditionalDetail: Grants the user advantage on saving throws against being charmed, frightened, paralyzed, poisoned, stunned, or put to sleep for 1d4 hours.

description.herbalismSkilled: Can be crafted into a Potion of Fire Resistance.
Can be crafted into a Potion of Healing.
Can be crafted into a Potion of Fire Breath.
Can be crafted into a Potion of Stealth, which grants advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks for 1 hour.
Can be crafted into a Potion of Fire Resistance.
Can be crafted into a Potion of Darkvision (Darkvision to 60 ft. for 1 hour)

description.herbalismCarefulSkilled: Can be carefully crafted into a Potion of Hill Giant Strength.

description.herbalismSkilled: Can be carefully crafted in one of the following potions: Potion of Necrotic Resistance, Potion of Poison Resistance, Potion of Psychic Resistance, Potion of Magic Resistance, Potion of Evasion (for 1 hour, if subjected to a Dexterity saving throw to take half damage, take half damage on a failed save and no damage on a success), or Potion of Truesight (grants truesight out to 120 feet for 1 hour).

description.herbalismAdditionalDetail: When the Demilich reforms, all un-crafted teeth return to the Demilich. If the Phylactery is destroyed, these items crumble into useless dust.

description.herbalismSkilled: Can be mastercrafted into a potion of poison immunity.

description.herbalismAdditionalDetail: When consumed, grants immunity to poison damage and the poisoned condition for 1 hour, and heals any poisons currently affecting the creature.

description.herbalismSkilled: Can be carefully crafted into a Potion of Flight or a Poison of Confusion.

description.herbalismAdditionalDetail: They look identical, and it is nearly impossible to discern which one was created without a DC 30 Intelligence (Religion) check. Potion of Flight Casts Flight Spell, Poison of Confusion Casts Confusion Spell

description.herbalismSkilled: Can be mastercrafted into a Potion of Magic Resistance.

description.herbalismAdditionalDetail: when consumed, a creature has advantage on saving throws made against spells and magic effects for 1 hour.

description.unskilled: Acts as an arcane focus for warlocks of the Fiend pact.

description.herbalismSkilled: 10 of these can be mastercrafted into a Potion of Magic Resistance.

description.herbalismAdditionalDetail: When consumed, a creature has advantage on saving throws made against spells and magic effects for 1 hour.

description.herbalismSkilled: Can be mastercrafted into a Potion of Magic Resistance.

description.herbalismAdditionalDetail: When consumed, a creature has advantage on saving throws made against spells and magic effects for 1 hour.

description.unskilled: Once per day, as an action, the head can teleport its holder, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 120 feet to an unoccupied space it's holder can see.

description.herbalismSkilled: Can be mastercrafted into a Potion of Truesight

description.herbalismAdditionalDetail: grants truesight out to 120 feet for 1 hour

description.herbalismSkilled: Can be crafted into a potion of Superior Darkvision

description.herbalismAdditionalDetail: grants darkvision out to 120 feet

description.unskilled: When held, the holder ignores movement restrictions caused by webbing.

description.herbalismSkilled: 5 of these can be mastercrafted into a Potion of Magic Resistance

description.herbalismAdditionalDetail: when consumed, a creature has advantage on saving throws made against spells and magic effects for 1 hour

description.herbalismSkilled: 20 of them can be mastercrafted into a Potion of Truesight

description.herbalismAdditionalDetail: grants truesight out to 120 feet for 1 hour

description.herbalismSkilled: Can be mastercrafted into a Potion of Invisibility.
Can be carefully crafted (alchemist’s supplies) into a Potion of Mind Reading
Can be mastercrafted into a Potion of Shadow

description.herbalismAdditionalDetail: Grants resistance to damage that isn’t force, fire, or radiant for one hour, as long as the user is in dim light or darkness. Additionally, any damage type, resistance, vulnerability, or immunity granted by an item from the dragon is changed to Necrotic

description.herbalismSkilled: Can be mastercrafted into a Potion of Acid Immunity

description.herbalismAdditionalDetail: grants immunity to acid damage for 1 hour

description.herbalismSkilled: Can be mastercrafted into a Potion of Lightning Immunity

description.herbalismAdditionalDetail: grants immunity to lightning damage for 1 hour

description.herbalismSkilled: Can be mastercrafted into a Potion of Poison Immunity

description.herbalismAdditionalDetail: grants immunity to poison damage for 1 hour

description.herbalismSkilled: Can be mastercrafted into a Potion of Fire Immunity

description.herbalismAdditionalDetail: grants immunity to fire damage for 1 hour

description.herbalismSkilled: Can be mastercrafted into a Potion of Cold Immunity

description.herbalismAdditionalDetail: grants immunity to cold damage for 1 hour

description.unskilled: When applied to the skin of a creature, the creature must make a DC 21 Constitution saving throw or fall unconscious for 10 minutes. This effect ends for a creature if the creature takes damage or someone uses an action to wake it.

description.herbalismSkilled: Can be mastercrafted into a Potion of Polymorph

description.herbalismAdditionalDetail: allows the drinker to change shape as though they had cast the Polymorph spell

description.unskilled: Can be thrown at a creature as an improvised weapon. On a hit, the vial breaks with a loud bang audible within 300 feet and the creature must make a DC 23 Strength saving throw or be pushed 60 feet away from the attacker.

description.herbalismSkilled: Can be mastercrafted into a Potion of Polymorph

description.herbalismAdditionalDetail: allows the drinker to change shape as though they had cast the Polymorph spell

description.unskilled: When applied to the skin of a creature, the creature must succeed on a DC 22 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the creature can't use reactions, its speed is halved, and it can't make more than one attack on its turn. In addition, the creature can use either an action or a bonus action on its turn, but not both. These effects last for 1 minute. The creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself with a successful save.

description.herbalismSkilled: Can be mastercrafted into a Potion of Polymorph

description.herbalismAdditionalDetail: allows the drinker to change shape as though they had cast the Polymorph spell

description.unskilled: When applied to the skin of a creature, the creature must make a DC 21 Constitution saving throw or fall unconscious for 10 minutes. This effect ends for a creature if the creature takes damage or someone uses an action to wake it.

description.herbalismSkilled: Can be mastercrafted into a Potion of Polymorph

description.herbalismAdditionalDetail: allows the drinker to change shape as though they had cast the Polymorph spell

description.unskilled: When applied to the skin of a creature, that creature must succeed on a DC 24 Constitution saving throw or be paralyzed for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

description.herbalismSkilled: Can be mastercrafted into a Potion of Polymorph

description.herbalismAdditionalDetail: allows the drinker to change shape as though they had cast the Polymorph spell

description.herbalismSkilled: Each can be crafted into a Potion of Climbing.
Can be crafted (alchemist’s supplies) into a Potion of Superior Darkvision

description.herbalismAdditionalDetail: Darkvision to 120 ft. for 1 hour

description.unskilled: When held, the holder can cast Druidcraft at will. If consumed, acts as a single berry from the Goodberry spell.

description.herbalismSkilled: Can be mastercrafted into a Potion of Animal Friendship.

description.unskilled: Marks the holder as an enemy of the Duergar.

description.herbalismSkilled: Can be carefully crafted into a Potion of Growth
mastercrafted into a Potion of Invisibility.

description.unskilled: Acts as a diamond worth 1,000 gp if used as the material component for a spell. Using it as a material component to cast Chromatic Orb allows the caster to choose Force damage or Radiant damage as the spell’s damage type.

description.herbalismSkilled: Can be mastercrafted into a Potion of Truesight

description.herbalismAdditionalDetail: truesight out to 120 feet for 1 hour when consumed

description.herbalismSkilled: Can be carefully crafted into a Potion of Hill giant strength.
Can be crafted into a Potion of Fire Resistance.
Can be carefully crafted into a Potion of Fungal Immunity

description.herbalismAdditionalDetail: For 1d4 hours, the user is immune to the poisoned condition if it would be caused by a fungus or fungal creature

description.herbalismSkilled: Can be carefully crafted into a Potion of Cloud Giant Strength.
Can be carefully crafted into a Potion of Fire Giant Strength.
Can be carefully crafted into a Potion of Frost Giant Strength.
Can be carefully crafted into a Potion of Hill Giant Strength.
Can be carefully crafted into a Potion of Stone Giant Strength.
Can be carefully crafted into a Potion of Storm Giant Strength.
Can be mastercrafted into a Stone Salve.

description.herbalismAdditionalDetail: Ends the petrified condition on a creature it is applied to.

description.herbalismSkilled: Can be carefully crafted into a Potion of Lightning Resistance.

description.unskilled: 20 teeth act as a bag of caltrops.

description.herbalismSkilled: 4 of these can be carefully crafted into a Potion of Fire Breath.

description.jewelerSkilled: Can be carefully crafted into dice.

description.herbalismSkilled: Can be carefully crafted into a potion of Nomog-Geaya.

description.herbalismAdditionalDetail: For 1 minute, the user gains the ability to deal an extra 10 (3d6) damage to a creature they hit with a weapon attack if the creature is within 5 feet of an ally of the user.

description.unskilled: Requires attunement. An attuned creature gains Truesight out to 60 feet.

description.herbalismSkilled: Can be mastercrafted into a Potion of Ultimate Resilience, which grants advantage on all saving throws for 8 hours.

description.unskilled: Can cast Conjure Animals (reptiles only) as a ritual spell. This consumes the heart.

description.herbalismSkilled: Can be carefully crafted into a Potion of Polymorph that can only change the drinker into a Crocodile.

description.herbalismAdditionalDetail: Allows the drinker to change shape as though they had cast the Polymorph spell, locked to Crocodile

description.herbalismSkilled: Can be mastercrafted into a Potion of Recall

description.herbalismAdditionalDetail: grants the drinker the ability to perfectly recall any path they have traveled for up to 8 hours. The drinker automatically succeeds on saving throws made to escape the Maze spell and similar areas.

description.unskilled: Can be consumed, or used as the material component of a Legend Lore spell, to learn the details of the mummy's life and compulsions.

description.herbalismSkilled: Can be mastercrafted into a Potion of Necrotic Resistance.

description.unskilled: Can be used as the material component to an Augury spell.

description.herbalismSkilled: Can be crafted into a Potion of Poison Resistance.

description.unskilled: As an action, a creature holding the eye can force another creature within 30 feet to make a DC 12 Constitution saving throw. On a failure, the target takes 3d6 necrotic damage.

description.herbalismSkilled: Can be carefully crafted into a Potion of Truesight, which confers Truesight out to 120 feet.

description.divinationSkilled: Can be mastercrafted by a spellcaster into a staff that requires attunement. An attuned creature can use its action to force a contest between its Wisdom (Insight) and a creature's Charisma (Deception) within 30 feet. If the attuned creature wins, it magically learns one fact or secret about the target. The target automatically wins if it is immune to being charmed.

description.unskilled: Requires attunement. A creature attuned to the eye can speak Giant, and regains 1 hit point at the start of its turn if it has at least 1 hit point.

description.herbalismSkilled: Can be mastercrafted into a Potion of Polymorph

description.herbalismAdditionalDetail: allows the drinker to change shape as though they had cast the Polymorph spell

description.unskilled: Can be used as a ranged weapon with a range of 20/60 by using a non-organic mechanism. On a hit, the Orange Jelly sticks to the target for 2 rounds, dealing 7 (2d6) acid damage a round.

description.herbalismSkilled: Can be carefully crafted into a potion of lightning resistance.
Can be crafted into a Potion of Gruumsh's Fury

description.herbalismAdditionalDetail: grants an extra 1d8 damage to all melee attacks for one hour, ends early if the user doesn't take an attack action against a creature for more than 5 consecutive rounds

description.unskilled: When held, grants advantage on Charisma (Intimidation) checks made against Orcs.

description.herbalismSkilled: Can be carefully crafted into a Potion of Aggression

description.herbalismAdditionalDetail: Grants the user the ability to dash towards a hostile creature as a bonus action on their turn, lasts one hour.

description.unskilled: Difficult to handle, deals 10 (3d6) fire damage per round to any organic or metal material in contact with it.

description.herbalismSkilled: Can be mastercrafted into a potion that grants immunity to cold damage for 1 hour.

description.unskilled: Difficult to handle, deals 7 (2d6) fire damage per round to any organic or metal material in contact with it.

description.herbalismSkilled: Can be mastercrafted into a potion of cold resistance.
Can be carefully crafted (alchemist’s supplies) into a Potion of Tremorsense

description.herbalismAdditionalDetail: grants Tremorsense to 60 feet for 1 hour

description.herbalismSkilled: Can be crafted into a Potion of Darkvision

description.herbalismAdditionalDetail: grants darkvision out to 60ft for one hour

description.careful: Can be carefully crafted into a Potion of Spider Climb

description.carefulAdditionalDetail: grants the ability to climb difficult surfaces, including ceilings, without needing to make an ability check

description.herbalismSkilled: Can be crafted into a Potion of Animal Friendship that only affects creatures with a swim speed.
Can be mastercrafted into a Potion of Elven Enmity

description.herbalismAdditionalDetail: grants advantage on attack rolls made against elves, and advantage on saving throws made against an effect originating from elves for 1 hour

description.herbalismSkilled: Can be crafted into a Potion of Fire Resistance or a Potion of Cold Resistance.

description.unskilled: Can be consumed as an action. A creature that consumes the eye is under the effects of a Detect Magic spell for 1 hour, no concentration required.

description.herbalismSkilled: Can be mastercrafted into a Potion of Truesight

description.herbalismAdditionalDetail: Potion confers truesight out to 120 feet for 1 hour when consumed.

description.unskilled: Difficult to transport, as big as a medium creature. Acts as a tent that is immune to acid damage. The gullet can be broken down into 10 Hunks of Tarrasque Meat.

description.leatherworkSkilled: Can be mastercrafted into 2d20 leather pouches, backpacks, or bags.

description.leatherworkAdditionalDetail: The bags are immune to acid damage and have resistance to bludgeoning, slashing, and piercing damage from nonmagical weapons.

description.herbSkilled: Can be mastercrafted into 1d10 Potions of Tarrasque Constitution

description.herbalismAdditionalDetail: for 1 hour, your Constitution score becomes 30. It has no effect if your Constitution score is already 30 or higher

description.unskilled: As an action, can be splashed onto a creature or object within 5 feet, or thrown as an improvised weapon. On a hit, the target takes 56 (16d6) acid damage.

description.herbalismSkilled: Can be mastercrafted into a potion of Acid Immunity

description.herbalismAdditionalDetail: for 1 hour, the user is immune to acid damage

description.herbalismSkilled: Can be mastercrafted into a Potion of Fine Fettle

description.herbalismAdditionalDetail: Provides permanent immunity from one of the following conditions: charmed, frightened, paralyzed, poisoned, or blinded.

description.herbalismSkilled: Can be carefully crafted into a Potion of Vitality.
Can be carefully crafted into a Potion of Tremorsense

description.herbalismAdditionalDetail: grants Tremorsense to 60 feet for 1 hour

description.herbSkilled: Can be mastercrafted into a Potion of Supreme Healing.

description.jewelSkilled: Can be carefully crafted into 1d6 magical dice.

description.jewelAdditionalDetail: If the dice are rolled as a pair, they will always roll a total of 7.

description.herbalismSkilled: Can be mastercrafted into a Potion of Truesight

description.herbalismAdditionalDetail: grants truesight out to 60 feet for 1 hour

description.herbalismSkilled: Can be carefully crafted into a potion of healing.
